name: MagicDrops
description:
Walk through forgotten lands to collect MagicDrops. Each level is an exciting challenge that needs your intelligence skill to solve it. Use booster to reach difficult levels and share your experience with your friends on Facebook.
With great graphic quality, impeccable sound, go inside the world of forgotten lands and spend hours of fun and entertainment with more than 400 levels. If you like match 3, games! This is your game!
